item.title: AVIENT CORP 10-K
item.description: AVIENT CORP, which is in the Plastics, Materials, Synth Resins & Nonvulcan Elastomers [2821] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 22, 2023 had 23958 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 250 instances financial - 198 instances avient - 191 instances 1 - 189 instances million - 188 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
